challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Jak bys byl slyšel, tak oni by byli tiší.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.answer: Jak bys byl slyšel, tak oni by byli tiší.
challenges.meaning: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formattedSolution: Jak bys byl slyšel, tak oni by byli tiší.
If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kdybys nebyl hloupý, tak bys nedělal hlouposti.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.answer: Kdybys nebyl hloupý, tak bys nedělal hlouposti.
challenges.meaning: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.formattedSolution: Kdybys nebyl hloupý, tak bys nedělal hlouposti.
If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kdyby oni nebyli líní, tak bychom jim pomáhali.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If they were not lazy, we would help them.

challenges.answer: Kdyby oni nebyli líní, tak bychom jim pomáhali.
challenges.meaning: If they were not lazy, we would help them.

challenges.formattedSolution: Kdyby oni nebyli líní, tak bychom jim pomáhali.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Děti jsou moudré na jejich věk.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: Children are wiser for their age.

challenges.answer: Děti jsou moudré na jejich věk.
challenges.meaning: Children are wiser for their age.

challenges.formattedSolution: Děti jsou moudré na jejich věk.
Children are wiser for their age.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kdybyste nebyli slabí, tak byste pracovali.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you were not weak, you would work.

challenges.answer: Kdybyste nebyli slabí, tak byste pracovali.
challenges.meaning: If you were not weak, you would work.

challenges.formattedSolution: Kdybyste nebyli slabí, tak byste pracovali.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: Lazy people do not want to do anything.

challenges.meaning: Lazy people do not want to do anything.

challenges.formattedSolution: Lazy people do not want to do anything.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: A sincere person says what they think.

challenges.meaning: A sincere person says what they think.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: A wise person stays silent when needed.

challenges.meaning: A wise person stays silent when needed.

challenges.formattedSolution: A wise person stays silent when needed.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kdybych byl smělý, tak bych se nebál.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If I were brave, I would not be afraid.

challenges.answer: Kdybych byl smělý, tak bych se nebál.
